entry.title: 文章中的单词积累
entry.content:
1. variant 变体，变种
    • The virus has developed a new variant.
  2. follow 采用，遵循
    • We follow the scientific method in our experiments.我们在实验中采用科学方法
    • A structured approach should be followed when writing code.编写代码时应遵循结构化的方法

entry.title: 数学标记及其英文读法
entry.content:
Symbol         Pronunciation                 Example Example Reading    
$\pi$ pi $\pi \approx 3.14$ pi approximately 3 point 14
$\hat{x}$ x hat $\hat{x} = 5$ x hat equals 5
$x^2$ x squared $x^2 + y^2 = z^2$ x squared plus y squared equals z squared
$x_n$ x sub n $x_n = \frac{1}{n}$ x sub n equals one over n
$\sum$ summation $\sum_{i=1}^n i$ summation from i equals 1 to n of i
$\int$ integral $\int_0^1 x,dx$ integral from 0 to 1 of x dx
$\infty$ infinity $\lim_{x \to \infty} f(x)$ limit as x approaches infinity of f of x
$\lim$ limit $\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\sin x}{x}$ limit as x approaches 0 of sin x over x
$\forall$ for all $\forall x \in \mathbb{R}$ for all x in real numbers
$\exists$ there exists $\exists x > 0$ there exists x greater than zero
$\equiv$ is congruent to $a \equiv b \pmod{n}$ a is congruent to b modulo n
$\to$ approaches / tends to $x \to 0$ x approaches zero
$\approx$ approximately equals $\pi \approx 3.14$ pi approximately equals 3 point 14
$\nabla$ del / gradient $\nabla f(x,y)$ gradient of f at x y
$\cdot$ dot $a \cdot b$ a dot b
$\times$ times / cross $\vec{a} \times \vec{b}$ vector a cross vector b
$\Rightarrow$ implies $P \Rightarrow Q$ P implies Q
$\leftarrow$ left arrow $x \leftarrow y$ x left arrow y
$\neq$ not equal $x \neq y$ x not equal y
$\leq$ less than or equal to $x \leq y$ x less than or equal to y
$\geq$ greater than or equal to $x \geq y$ x greater than or equal to y
$\subset$ is subset of $A \subset B$ A is subset of B
$\supset$ is superset of $B \supset A$ B is superset of A
$\cup$ union $A \cup B$ A union B
$\cap$ intersection $A \cap B$ A intersection B
$\mathbb{R}$ real numbers $\mathbb{R}$ real numbers
$\mathbb{N}$ natural numbers $\mathbb{N}$ natural numbers
$\partial$ partial (derivative) $\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}$ partial derivative of f with respect to x

entry.title: 零散的英语学习笔记
entry.content:
记录平时遇到的特殊的短语搭配和句子…

  1. I think it was a mutual conversation.我觉得那是一场彼此尊重/双方参与的谈话
  2. 描述某种意义上努力的成果：
    • It’s kind of the fruit of our labor.
    • It’s sort of a result of the hard work we put in.
    • It’s a kind of reward for all the work.
  3. I think I’m gonna try being more straight edge for a while.我要尝试一段时间更自律一点
    • straight edge:引申为更克制，更健康的生活方式，不吸烟，不喝酒..
  4. I find it tricky to say no without hurting people’s feelings.我觉得拒绝别人又不伤人感情挺难的
    • tricky:有点难，有点挑战，棘手的..
  5. a natural place for spontaneity 一个适合自然流露/即兴发挥的地方
    • The studio became a natural place for spontaneity and creative flow工作室成了一个自然流露灵感与创意的地方
    • Our friendship has always been a natural place for spontaneity.我们的友谊一直都很自在，比较随心所欲
    • That living room was a natural place for spontaneity-laughter,music and dancing just happend.那个客厅就是个适合即兴发挥的地方-笑声，音乐，舞蹈都自然发生
  6. To put in a nutshell(or just “In a nutshell”)简单来说/简而言之/一句话总结
    • To put in a nutshell,she didn’t show up,and we had to cancel everything.一句话总结，她没来，我们只好取消一切
    • He explain quantum mechanics in a nutshell.他用简单易懂的方式解释了量子力学
  7. Be present in the moment
    1. 可以分开用
      • Be present专注/到场/用心参与：Please be present during the meeting.
      • In the moment在那一刻/顺其自然/不顾将来：I wasn’t thinking,I just act in the moment.
    2. 合起来用
      • Be present in the moment活在当下/专注此刻：Try to be present in the moment instead of thinking about past.
  8. a bit of imposter syndrome 有点觉得自己不够格
    • I got the job,but I still feel a bit of imposter syndrome sometimes.我拿到了这份工作，但有时候还是会觉得自己好像不配
    • She’s incredibly talented,yet she struggles with imposter syndrome.她非常有才华，但却一直受到“冒名顶替感”的困扰
  9. ish后缀，意思是大约（口语化表达，文章中用得少）
    • Let’s meet at 3-ish so we can grab a coffee before the movie.我们大概三点见吧，这样可以在看电影前喝杯咖啡
  10. down for that表赞同，愿意参加某个提议或活动（口语化表达）
    • Well, if my friends invite me to go hiking or catch a movie, I’m usually down for that. I enjoy spending time outdoors or just relaxing with good company.
  11. go all out for something/someone拼尽全力去做…/不遗余力支持…
    • They went all out for the championship. 他们为了冠军拼尽了全力
    • She went all out for her best friend’s wedding. 她为了好朋友的婚礼倾尽了所有的心力
    • The company is going all out for the product launch. 公司正全力以赴准备产品发布
  12. in a minute
    1. 立刻，马上，很快的意思
      • Can you wait? I’ll finish this in a minute.
    2. 用在否定句中表幽默夸张的反话
      • I haven’t seen you in a minute! 好久不见了（意思是很久没见）
  13. push one’s limit 挑战某人的极限
    • This job really pushes my limits, but I’m learning a lot.这份工作确实挑战了我的极限，但我学到了很多
    • She always pushes her limits to achieve more. 她总是突破极限，力求更进一步

..to be continue..

entry.title: 文章中的常见英文（短语，缩写..）
entry.content:
阅读英语文章时常见以下缩写：

  1. e.g. 例如（for example）
    • Many animals, e.g., lions and tigers, are carnivores.
  2. i.e. 也就是说/即（that is to say）
    • He is a polyglot, i.e., someone who speaks several languages.
  3. viz. 即/具体来说（namely）
    • Three cities, viz. London, Paris, and Rome, are on the list.
  4. cf. 参见/比较（compare）
    • Cf. Smith (2002) for a different approach.
  5. et al. 等等/以及其他人（and others）
    • The paper was written by Johnson et al.
  6. etc. 等等（and so on）
    • We need paper, pens, etc.
  7. s.t. 通常是subject to的缩写,指：满足..的条件，在..情况下
    • minimize f(x) s.t. g(x)≤0

阅读英语文章时常见以下短语：

  1. in line with 与…一致/符合
    • This decision is in line with company policy.
    • Her results were in line with our expectations.
    • His actions are not in line with his values.
  2. in the sequel 在后续中/在续集中
    • In the sequel,the hero comes back stronger.
    • I hope they explain her past in the sequel.
    • In the sequel, we often use graph-theoretical notations for MCs which refer to the underlying digraph of M.
      1. symbol:单个的标记，用来代表某个特定的概念、对象或操作。它通常是一个字符或图形。
      2. notation:一整套用于表达思想、概念或公式的规则和方式，往往由多个symbols组成。是表达的体系。
      • 简单地来讲：symbol是单个字符，notation是使用字符的一套语言系统
  3. in this sense 从这个角度看/在这个意义下/就此而言
    • The system is stable. In this sense, it returns to equilibrium after small disturbances.这个系统是稳定的。就这个角度来说，它在受到小扰动后会恢复到平衡状态
  4. it follows that 由此可得/因此/可以得出
    • All humans are mortal. Socrates is a human. It follows that Socrates is mortal.所有人都会死亡。苏格拉底是人。因此可推出苏格拉底会死亡
  5. consequence of 结果/推论（学术场景）
    • As a direct consequence of Theorem 10.25 作为定理10.25的直接结果
  6. amount to 等同于/归结为
    • In practice, solving this equation amounts to finding the roots of a polynomial.实际上，解这个方程就是在找一个多项式的根
  7. to that end 为此/为了那个目的
    • We want to improve customer satisfaction. To that end, we’ve hired more support staff.我们希望提升客户满意度。为此，我们增聘了更多客服人员

To be continue…
